TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , a retired military officer , was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an application with ORG ( ORG ) ( hereafter “ the ORG ” ) asking for an additional retirement premium , following the amendment of the date of his retirement . On DATE and DATE ORG rejected his application at first instance and on appeal respectively .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a recourse with ORG challenging the decisions of the Fund .
CARDINAL . In a judgment dated CARDINAL DATE ORG partially upheld the applicant 's claim and awarded him MONEY ( ORG ) ( i.e. MONEY ) ( judgment no . DATE ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG lodged an appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG accepted the ORG 's appeal and quashed the first instance decision , after having concluded that the legal requirements for the award of an additional retirement premium had not been satisfied ( judgement no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) . The applicant was served with the decision on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal on points of law .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the appellate decision and remitted the case to ORG ( judgment no . DATE ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the appeal lodged by the ORG against judgment no . DATE of ORG ( judgment no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) . The applicant was served with the decision on CARDINAL DATE .
